February i*, 1957
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Skornia:
lour letter of January 17, 1957 to my Father, Dr. 0. C. Carmichael,
has recently been forwarded to me.
Perhaps you are not aware that my Father is no longer with the
University of Alabama and is now with the Ford Foundation. At the
present time he is in India and will be traveling abroad for several
months, returning to Asheville around June 1st.
I am putting your letter on file, and will turn it over to him
upon his return.
in .
FHCsas
